content: round 120 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends securely with tapestry needle *page 5* pineapple dreams dish cloth by julee a reeves finished size 10 x 10 materials main color- approx 2 ozs worsted weight cotton yarn contrasting color- 1 ball of cotton yarn will make many borders on many dish cloths h crochet hook tapestry needle a little bit of time special stitches popcorn double_crochet in indicated space 5 times take hook out of loop and insert into first double_crochet made then back into the dropped loop pull the loop through the first double_crochet shell 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in indicated space gauge first 3 rnds of pattern= 3 *page 6* with main color ch2 round 1 8 single_crochet in second chain from hk join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 8 single_crochet round 2 ch3 double_crochet 4 times in same st as slip_stitch base of ch3 take hook out of loop and insert into first double_crochet made top of ch3 then back into the dropped loop pull the loop through the first double_crochet ch2 *popcorn in next single_crochet ch2* repeat from * to * 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 slip_stitch in next ch2 space 8 popcorn sts 8 ch2 sps round 3 ch1 single_crochet in same space as slip_stitch ch3 *single_crochet in next ch2 space ch3* repeat from * to * 7 times join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet slip_stitch in next ch3 space 8 single_crochet 8 ch3 sps round 4 ch1 single_crochet in same space as slip_stitch ch1 double_crochet 7 times in next ch3 space ch1 *single_crochet in next ch3 space ch1 double_crochet 7 times in next ch3 space ch1* repeat from * to * 3 times join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 28 double_crochet 8 ch1 sps 4 single_crochet round 5 ch5 counts as beg ch3 + ch2 space *double_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in each of next 6 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next single_crochet ch2* repeat from * to * 3 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 3rd chain from slip_stitch 32 double_crochet 24 ch1 sps 8 ch2 sps round 6 ch5 double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch first v_stitch made *ch2 single_crochet ch3 in each of the next 5 ch1 sps single_crochet in next ch1 space ch2 skip next double_crochet double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * 3 times ch2 single_crochet ch3 in each of the next 5 ch1 sps single_crochet in next ch1 space ch2 join with slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 8 double_crochet 20 ch3 sps 12 ch2 sps round 7 ch3 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet *ch2 single_crochet ch3 in each of next 4 ch3 sps single_crochet in next ch3 space ch2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet * repeat from * to * 3 times ch2 single_crochet ch3 in each of the next 4 ch3 sps single_crochet
